title: Chapter XXl Armageddon
description: This is a story of time travel that begins during the 2nd World War in the Highlands of Scotland. The project is re-started in the early 1970's and finally succeeds in the 21st century, or does it? It is a fast moving tale that travels from Scotland to Rome to the USA. There is adventure under the North Atlantic in a British nuclear submarine. Tension as an enemy boats lurks near and seeks to sink the British boat. They is spying and intrigue at the base compound. There is lots of whiskey consumed and a lots of empties. This is truly an intoxicating story
author: Mr Frederick Rodgers
